text: Samuel Ward (born 19 January 1995) is a Swedish professional ice hockey goaltender. He is currently playing with Västerviks IK in the Swedish HockeyAllsvenskan. Ward made his professional and Swedish Hockey League debut playing with Luleå HF during the 2012–13 SHL season. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Asplöven HC players Category:Luleå HF players Category:Sparta Warriors players Category:Västerviks IK players Category:Swedish ice hockey goaltenders Category:Swedish expatriate ice hockey people Category:Swedish expatriate sportspeople in Norway
title: Samuel Ward (ice hockey)
